args:
Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no".
Trump administration details border plans, instructions to the military
The incoming Trump administration said it will issue 10 executive orders regarding the border Monday.
In a call with reporters, officials described the situation on the border as “an invasion,” though a federal judge has disagreed with that characterization, and border crossings remain lower than they were when President Donald Trump left office in 2021. Among the plans:
